text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes its me bob
Join me for learning street with bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host.
Welcome to our PHONICS SHOW
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet. Isn’t that cool?
They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
Here comes  T T T T T  Tall  Mr. T.

Who amongst us has the sharpest brain?
It is of course, Bob the train.
T T train, T T train
I can hear a ringing tone Ah, it’s my telephone.
T T telephone ,T T telephone

You always start with the number one
And count your way from one to ten.
One to ten, T T ten.

He is brave, and lives in a cave 
He’s a big cat called a tiger.
T T tiger, T T tiger.

To a summer camp I once went
Where I put up a comfy tent
T T tent, T T tent

You know kids what gives me joy?
Playing all day with my favourite toy.
T T toy, T T toy
I love to hug Mr. Ed Eddy he’s my big soft cute teddy
T T teddy, T T teddy.

When I want to read a fancy fable
I sit with a book on my little table
T T table, T T table

When I sneeze I go aachoo (a tshoo)
I reach very fast for a tissue.
A T T tissue, T T tissue
Don’t we just love Mr. T
Judges, what’s the score going to be?
Talented!
Totally awesome!
Terrific!
Trustworthy!
Thrilling!
Thank you Mr. T and Judges.
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters of the alphabet.
Till then Ta Da
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
